parameters.name: pipelineName
parameters.description: The name of the pipeline whose information is retrieved.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the pipeline.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the pipeline.

nested_items.name: activities
nested_items.description: The activities that perform transformations on the messages.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the channel activity.

nested_items.name: channelName
nested_items.description: The name of the channel from which the messages are processed.

nested_items.name: next
nested_items.description: The next activity in the pipeline.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the lambda activity.

nested_items.name: lambdaName
nested_items.description: The name of the Lambda function that is run on the message.

nested_items.name: batchSize
nested_items.description: The number of messages passed to the Lambda function for processing.

nested_items.name: next
nested_items.description: The next activity in the pipeline.

nested_items.name: datastore
nested_items.description: Specifies where to store the processed message data.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the datastore activity.

nested_items.name: datastoreName
nested_items.description: The name of the data store where processed messages are stored.

nested_items.name: addAttributes
nested_items.description: Adds other attributes based on existing attributes in the message.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the addAttributes activity.

nested_items.name: attributes
nested_items.description: A list of 1-50 AttributeNameMapping objects that map an existing attribute to a new attribute.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: next
nested_items.description: The next activity in the pipeline.

nested_items.name: removeAttributes
nested_items.description: Removes attributes from a message.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the removeAttributes activity.

nested_items.name: attributes
nested_items.description: A list of 1-50 attributes to remove from the message.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: next
nested_items.description: The next activity in the pipeline.

nested_items.name: selectAttributes
nested_items.description: Used to create a new message using only the specified attributes from the original message.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the selectAttributes activity.

nested_items.name: attributes
nested_items.description: A list of the attributes to select from the message.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: next
nested_items.description: The next activity in the pipeline.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the filter activity.

nested_items.name: filter
nested_items.description: An expression that looks like a SQL WHERE clause that must return a Boolean value. Messages that satisfy the condition are passed to the next activity.

nested_items.name: next
nested_items.description: The next activity in the pipeline.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the math activity.

nested_items.name: attribute
nested_items.description: The name of the attribute that contains the result of the math operation.

nested_items.name: math
nested_items.description: An expression that uses one or more existing attributes and must return an integer value.

nested_items.name: next
nested_items.description: The next activity in the pipeline.

nested_items.name: deviceRegistryEnrich
nested_items.description: Adds data from the IoT device registry to your message.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the deviceRegistryEnrich activity.

nested_items.name: attribute
nested_items.description: The name of the attribute that is added to the message.

nested_items.name: thingName
nested_items.description: The name of the IoT device whose registry information is added to the message.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the role that allows access to the device's registry information.

nested_items.name: next
nested_items.description: The next activity in the pipeline.

nested_items.name: deviceShadowEnrich
nested_items.description: Adds information from the IoT Device Shadow service to a message.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the deviceShadowEnrich activity.

nested_items.name: attribute
nested_items.description: The name of the attribute that is added to the message.

nested_items.name: thingName
nested_items.description: The name of the IoT device whose shadow information is added to the message.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the role that allows access to the device's shadow.

nested_items.name: next
nested_items.description: The next activity in the pipeline.

nested_items.name: reprocessingSummaries
nested_items.description: A summary of information about the pipeline reprocessing.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The reprocessingId returned by StartPipelineReprocessing.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the pipeline reprocessing.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time the pipeline reprocessing was created.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: When the pipeline was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The last time the pipeline was updated.
